mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.jianguanuyuan_name as jianguanuyuanName ,a.jianguanuyuan_photo as jianguanuyuanPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.jianguanuyuan_phone as jianguanuyuanPhone ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM jianguanuyuan a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.jianguanuyuan_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianguanuyuanName},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.jianguanuyuan_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianguanuyuanPhone},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
